    private void num7ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        a=a+7;
        pantallita.setText(a);// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                    

    private void sumaActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        x= new Suma();
        b= Double.parseDouble(a);
        a="";
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                    

    private void num0ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {

        pantallita.setText(a);// TODO add your handling code here:
    }

    private void multiplicacionActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {

    }                                              

    private void divisionActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
        x= new Division();
        b= Double.parseDouble(a);
        a="";// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void puntoActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                      
        a=a+".";
        pantallita.setText(a);// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                     

    private void igualActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                      

        pantallita.setText(x.calculadora(b,Double.parseDouble(a))+"");
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                     

    private void borradorcitoActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                             
        this.pantallita.setText("");
        a="";// TODO add your handling code here:
    }
